Class: LineTrace

plugins/collision/sprite-with-map/line-trace. LineTrace

new LineTrace(opts)

Creates a tracer that traces a line along a path to detect collision. Note that this should not be constructed directly, but rather via the plugin factory method createCollider on the engine.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Object An object with assorted options set in it.
autoSlip
Defaults to true for isometric maps. If set, the collision trace will 'slip' away from jagged pixel edges to prevent sprites from being caught up in jaggies when moving at isometric angles. In unsure, omit this property to use the default.

Methods

test(x0, y0, dx, dy, h, out) → {Number}

Perform a trace to test for collision along a line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
x0 Number World X position of the starting point
y0 Number World Y position of the starting point
dx Number Amount to move in the X axis
dy Number Amount to move in the Y axis
h Number Tile pixel height considered the ground (non-collision)
out Array An optional 2-length array which will recieve the point of contact. You can interpret this as the position to which the character can go along its path at which it will be touching a solid object. If there is no collision, the output position will be the desired new position.
Returns:
A number from 0-1 representing how far along the route the trace managed to get. 1 means no collision.
Type
Number
